resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
You’d need to login to view the content
Speech recognition is not available on this device. Do you want to install Google app to have speech recognition?
You need to grant the permission to use the microphone
Please enable Google Voice Typing to use speech recognition!
Define the piece of knowledge you want to add below
Type here,attach a file or both
Choose one or more destinations to publish the knowledge ‘Marketing Headcount’
From the perspective of a user searching, provide 3 unique ways in which a person might query for this piece of knowledge?

* To help your colleges find this Knowledge item with a natural language search, a minimum of 3 statements is required. Machine Learning (ML) will process this and create many more possibilities. The more you add, the more accurately ML is able to match the users intent with your Knowledge Item.
Review for accuracy, choose additional options and submit your piece of knowledge for approval.
Link to reset your password is sent to your email address
Tap to paste from your clipboard
What do you want to announce?
All are valid questions! Kora can help answer these common questions asked around the office, saving you time and energy from having to keep answering them.
Write your knowledge article the way you would want users to read it. Add links, images, video and more into your article to make it as detailed as needed.
The guest wifi password for January 2018 is abcd1234. Please do not share with anyone other than Guests of ACME Inc.
Step 2: Train Kora the right questions
From the perspective of someone looking for information in your article, train Kora a few ways in which people might ask for that information.

“What is the guest wifi password?” 
 “What is the wireless password for guests?” 
 “How can I give internet access to a guest?” 
 “How can a guest connect to the internet?”

“What is the guest wifi password?” 
 “How do I setup the office printer?” 
 “What is the travel policy?” 
 “What is the status of Project X?”
Choose people or teams from your organisation with whom you want this article to be shared. From that point, when someone asks the right question, Kora will provide the article as the answer.
“Hi Kora, Can you tell me what the guest wifi password is?”
The guest wifi password for January 2018 is abcd1234. Please do not share with anyone other than Guests of ACME Inc.
From the perspective of a someone searching, provide 3 unique ways a person might ask for this knowledge?
To help your co-workers find this knowledge with a simple question, at least 3 trigger questions are required. The more you add, the more accurately Kora will be able to match this knowledge.
Select the people, teams or company you want to share this knowledge article with

plurals.name: follow_count
plurals.item: 1 Person is currently following this article
%d Persons are currently following this article

resources.string: Share this article with your colleagues and teams. Also manage permissions on viewing and sharing this article.
This article has not been shared with anyone yet
If disabled, people will not receive a notification about this share, but will be able to find this article by searching or browsing for it.
Train Kora to provide this article as an answer to a question. Provide 3 unique ways of asking a question to get this knowledge article as an answer
To help your co-workers find this knowledge with a simple question, at least 3 trigger questions are required. The more you add, the more accurately Kora will be able to match this knowledge.
Title is required to post the article.
Title is required to make an announcement
Description is required to post the article.
Description is required to make an announcement.
Description for the meeting notes is required to save %s
Title for the meeting notes is required.
Adding #tags to your article allows for better organization and searchability.
Deleting knowledge will remove this across all the users that the knowledge is shared with, Do you want to proceed?

Once unshared, this article will become private to only you. No one will be able to browse or search for this article. Any learning on this article will be suspended.\nComments and voting history will be preserved. You will have the option to clear or keep comments/votes when you re-share.
This article is currently Private \nOnly you can see it

Once cleared, Kora will no longer be able to find this article when someone searches for it with a natural language statement. The article will still be accessible to those who it has been shared with by browsing or with a keyword meta data search.
Add the people you would like to invite to this meeting. Kora will contact each person to check their availability.
Who do you want to Invite?
Kora will request a %1$s meeting to all invitees in the %2$s between %3$s and %4$s. Kora will automatically check all accessible calendars and provide the best available time slots.
Kora will request a %1$s meeting to all invitees %2$s on %3$s. Kora will automatically check all accessible calendars and provide the best available timeslots.
Tip: Choose the range of possible dates that the meeting request can be scheduled for. The broader the choice, the higher the possibility to find an acceptable timeslot for everyone
Choose the time of day that you would prefer this meeting be scheduled.
There are no time slots on this day where all required invitees are available
Your session will now end. Please re-login again.
Choose the from and to date ranges for this meeting. Any dates that you are not available will automatically be excluded by Kora.
Manage the permissions for different user types for this team.
If enabled, any user within the company can share a knowledge article to this team.
If enabled, any member of this team can share a knowledge article to this team.
If enabled, any admin of this team can share a knowledge article to this team.
If enabled, admins of this team can add, remove, promote or demote any member of this team except the Owner.
If enabled, admins can modify the team name and manage the permission levels of this team.
Articles shared by a non-member to the team must be approved by an admin or owner before it becomes visible to all other members.
Articles shared by non-members into the team is approved automatically and visible to all members immediately.
Articles shared by a non-member to the team must be approved by the owner before it becomes visible to all other members.
Articles shared by team members into the team is approved automatically and visible to all members immediately.
Articles shared by a team members to the team must be approved by an admin or owner before it becomes visible to all other members.
Articles shared by a team members to the team must be approved by the owner before it becomes visible to all other members.
Articles shared by team admins into the team is approved automatically and visible to all members immediately.
Articles shared by a team admins to the team must be approved by the owner before it becomes visible to all other members.
Teams gives you and your team a place \n to discuss ideas, share knowledge, and more.
Please provide a name for the team
Please provide an @mention name. The @mention name can be used to effectively grab team members’ attention when added to an article

Please ensure your team name adheres to the following guidelines: 
(1) Starts with a letter or number. 
(2) Contains 2 or more characters. 
(3) Can contain A–Z, a-z, 0-9, and ‘-‘

Please ensure your @mention name adheres to the following guidelines: 
(1) Starts with a letter or number. 
(2) Contains 2 or more characters. 
(3) Can contain a-z, 0-9
By deleting a team, team members will no longer be able to access articles shared with the team. Would you like to continue?
Once you leave the team, you will no longer be able to access articles shared with the team. Would you like to continue?
Select one or more people to add to your team
%s wants to post this article in this team and it needs your approval
Please pick your preferred slots, you can choose up to 3 slots
If enabled, Kora will not consider %s of every week when a coworker is looking for availability in your calendar.
Adjust your available time for meetings on %s of any given week.
Adjust your work hours on %s of any given week.
You can edit and manage the work hours as per your actual availability.
Are you sure you want to Sign Out?
You will no longer receive new messages & other notifications on this device.
When enabled, all incoming notifications will be silenced for the selected period of time.
When enabled, people who send you messages and tasks will be notified that you are currently on vacation. Do not disturb is enabled and current city sharing will be disabled.
Allow people to see your current city in your profile or by asking kora \"Where is %s ?\" Only the city name is revealed and not your actual location for privacy.
Allow people to see your working hours in your profile and by asking Kora \"What is %s\'s schedule today?\"
Allow people to see your work address in your profile and by simply asking Kora \"What is %s\'s work address?\"
Personalize Kora the way you want. Kora can launch and react the way you want.
When enabled, Kora will send you a summary of your day with the information you selected.
When enabled, Kora will send you a summary of your week with the information you selected.

Something went wrong! 

 😔 

 Please try again
has integrated the company standard authentication mechanism with Kore.ai. The credentials required would be the same that you login with at your company for email.
This team has not yet been activated, An email was sent with this activation link to"
Since you used your facebook to authenticate previously, you must sign back in using same facebook account.
Since you used your gmail to authenticate previously, you must sign back in using same gmail account.
Since you used your Kore.ai-id to authenticate previously, you must sign back in using same Kore.ai-id account.
We see you used Facebook to login the last time you were here.
We see you used Google+ to login the last time you were here.
Touch the button below to sign in again to this account.
I’m Kora.\n Your personal \n enterprise assistant.
When you set your meeting hours, Kora will only let meetings be scheduled within the chosen time frame
By clicking Sign in, I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Your password must be at least 6 characters long and it should contain atleast one upper case and one lower case.
Verification link sent to email below has expired:
An email has been sent to the email address below.
for your protection, the verification link will be active for only 24 hours.
Be sure to check your junk/spam folder as sometimes verification emails may get blocked by your email provider.
Do you want to update this for rest of days?
No team which matches this criteria!

plurals.name: complete_task
plurals.item: 1 Task selected for completion. Please confirm.

resources.string: No one to play with? Just search and add people or teams
Add or change tags to your post so that it’s easy to search and organise
Adding upto 5 tags is usually enough to get visibility in search results
Train Kora to present this knowledge article as an answer to your question. Add unique ways of asking a questions regarding this knowledge article.
What can I do for you?
Shoutout to the people and make yourself heard!
Configure your preferred meeting type, username and work hours
You can personalize in app sound settings.
Kora sends both push notifications and in-app notifications. Configure which push notifications you would like to receive
Turn on/off push notifications related to Meetings
Turn on/off push notifications related to Knowledge Articles
Turn on/off push notifications related to Contacts and Teams
Turn on/off push notifications related to Announcements
Turn on/off some general push notifications from Kora
Configure shortcuts to Kora utterances for quick and easy actions
Kora will use configured meeting types while scheduling meetings
Add your preferred username to get your action email IDs configured with Kora
Kora will use the configured work hours for scheduling meetings and assigning tasks
Enable speaker icon to be shown in the home chat screen
When any of the invitees respond to your meeting request
When someone shares an article with you
When someone comments on an article that user shared
When someone comments on an article that you follow
When an article that you follow is updated
When someone comments on an announcement that you commented on
Configure different meeting types like web and phone calls here
Weather unit is selected based on location by default
Configure your preferred work hours in Kora
Configure your preferred username and work hours in Kora
Kora will use the configured work hours for scheduling meetings
Kora will use the configured work hours for assigning tasks
"Some features are turned off for you! \n Please contact your administrator."
Skills are external bots or services that can be integrated into Kora
Configure search skills to let Kora search into external services
Enter a username to set up your Kora services
Include this address in any email thread to schedule meeting with the participants
Include this address in any email thread to share the email as knowledge article with the participants
Configure different meeting locations like web and phone calls here
